sections.heading: DEMAND AGAINST THIRD PARTYArt. 1111
sections.text: Defendant may bring in third personThe defendant in a principal action by petition may bring in any person, including a codefendant, who is his warrantor, or who is or may be liable to him for all or part of the principal demand.In such cases the plaintiff in the
